author: Staff Reporter
text:
Sivappa (45), a farmer, was electrocuted here in his field at Kelamangalam on Wednesday.

The incident occurred while he was irrigating his field and attempted to repair the motor which had failed to work.

He was rushed to Denkanikottai government hospital, where he was declared dead.

Quack arrested

A quack was arrested at Eachampadi in Dharmapuri on Thursday.

The arrested was Abdul Razzaq (49), who had only completed his Standard VIII, and was running a clinic at Eaachampaadi here.

Based on a tip-off, the clinic of Abdul Razzaq was raided by health officials.

The accused was a resident of Harur.

He was arrested by Harur police based on a complaint lodged by the health department officials.
title: Farmer electrocuted
